NAME: Name
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
ENTER_NAME_DESC: Enter your first and last names to update the details.
ENTER_PASS_DESC: Enter your current password and then enter the new password you wish to have.
NO_TRANSACTIONS: No incoming transactions at the moment
NO_ASSETS: No assets assigned to your account at the moment
FILL_FIELDS: Fill up all the fields and press Transfer button to transfer assets to another user.
ACC_MSG: This is your primary account. This account will be used to do all the transactions.
NO_ACCOUNTS: No accounts available for the user
FILL_FIELD_TRANSFER: Fill up all the fields and press Transfer button to transfer funds to your accounts
DEFAULT_ACC_TRANSFER: This the fund transfer will be done using the default account.
TRANSFER_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to transfer?
RESET_PASSWORD_MSG: An e-mail will be sent to this address with the steps to reset your password.
RESET_CODE_MSG: Please enter the reset code we sent to your email address.
NO_OUTGOING_TRANSACTIONS: No outgoing transactions at the moment
ACC_FUND_NOTI: Your account will be funded within the next 24 hours. You will be notified once you receive funds.
DIFF_ACC: Sign in with a different account
SAFE_KEY: Keep this in a safe place since this will be required to change the password of the account.
FALIED_TO_COPY_KEY: Failed to copy the key. Manually copy or write it down somewhere safe.
PASSWORD_DONOT_MATCH: New password and confirm password do not match.
FAILED_ADD_TRANSACTION: Failed to add the transaction account. Please try again or contact an admin.
ACC_BLOCKED: Your account is blocked. Please contact an admin.
ACC_NAME_EXISTS: Account name already exists. Please pick a different name for the account.
NOT_VALIDATE_ACC_NAME: Error occured. Could not validate account name.
NO_CONNECTION: There is no internet connection to complete this task. Please try again.
APP_UPDATED_RESTART: Application updated successfully. Please restart the application to apply the changes.
COULD_NOT_UPDATE: Could not update the application due to an error. Please try again later.
WRONG_UPDATE: There is something wrong with the new update. Please try again later.
NO_INTERNET: There is no internet connection at the moment. Please check your connectivity settings in the device.
TRY_AGAIN_VALID_AMOUNT: lumens. Please try again with a valid amount.
MINIMUM_TRANSFER_AMOUNT: Minimum transfer amount should be greater than 2 lumens. Please try again with a valid amount.
FILL_REQUIRED: Please fill in all the required fields.
CANNOT_FIND_ACC: Could not find any other accounts. Please try again after creating a new Transaction account.
FILL_ALL_FIELDS: Make sure to fill out all the fields before submitting the form.
INVALID_ASSET: Invalid asset quantity. Please try with a valid amount.
NOT_ENOUGH_ASSETS: Not enough assests to transfer. Please try with a valid amount.
IDENTIFIER_DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE: Identifier data is not available. Please try again after the blue notification bar dissappears from top.
VALID_ID: Identifier provided does not belong to any item. Please enter a valid identifier.
ASSET_TRANSFER_SUCCESS: Assets successfully transferred. You can view the transaction status in Sent page.
FAILED_TO_SEND_TRANSACTION: Failed to send the transaction. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_BUILD_TRANSACTION: Failed to build the transaction. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_VERIFY_ASSET: Failed to verify the asset issuer. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_VERIFY_TRANSC: Failed to verify transaction. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_PREPARE_TRANSACTION: Failed to prepare the transaction. Please try again.
INVALID_TRANSACTION_PASSWORD: Invalid transaction password. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_FETCH_ACCOUNT: Failed to fetch the account details for received items. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_FETCH_RECEIVED: Failed to fetch the received items. Please try again.
ACC_REJECT_PENDING_COC: Please accept or reject pending CoC transactions before. There are currently
UPDATED_RESULTS_TRANSFER: You can see the updated results in Transfer page.
ASSET_NOT_CHANGE: Your asset amout will not be changed.
COULD_NOT_PROCEED: Could not proceed with the action. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_FETCH_ACCOUNT_SENT: Failed to fetch the account details for sent items. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_FETCH_SENT: Failed to fetch the sent items. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_STORE_TRANS_ACC: Failed to store transaction accounts in memory.
FAILED_TO_LOGIN: Failed to log into your account.
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED: Your account is blocked. Please contact an Admin.
NO_INTERNET_MOMENT: There is no internet at the moment.
SUCCESS_CHANGED_PASSWORD: You have successfully changed your password. Please use the new password and log back again.
COULD_NOT_RESET: Could not reset the password. Something went wrong.
COULD_NOT_VERIFY: Could not verify the email. Something went wrong.
PASSWORDS_DONOT_MATCH: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
FAILED_TO_CHANGE_ACC_NAME: Failed to change the account name. Please try again later.
CANNOT_CHANGE_ACC_NAME: Cannot change the account name at the moment.
CHANGE_PASSWORD_LOGGED_OUT: Once you change the account password you will be automatically logged out from the application. Do you want to continue?
FAILED_TO_CHANGE_PASSWORD: Failed to change the account password. Please try again later.
CANNOT_CHANGE_PASSWORD: Cannot change the account password at the moment.
CHANGE_TRANS_PASS_LOGOUT: Once you change the transaction password you will be automatically logged out from the application. Do you want to continue?
CANNOT_CHANGE_TRAS_PASSWORD: Cannot change the transaction password at the moment.
CHANGING_PHOTO_UNAVAILABLE: Changing profile photo is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
FAILED_TO_TRANSFER: Failed to transfer funds for the account.
FAILED_TO_IDENTIFY_RECEIVER: Failed to identify the receivers account. Please try again.
INVALID_TRANSACTION_PASS: Invalid transaction password. Please try again.
VIEW_ACC_INFO: lumens. View account information to see the updated amount.
PENDING_TRANSACTION_ERROR: There is a a pending trasaction from you to the same receiver! Can not change custody until the receiver accepts the pending CoC request!
ACC_REGISTERED: This account is officially registered and recognzed by Tracified and the community. You may now use this account send Testimonials
UPDATED_RESULTS_ORGANIZATION: You can see the organization in Registered Organizations page.
BC_COULD_NOT_PROCEED: Could not proceed with the action.
